name: Bigger finger
info: Tapping gives triple amount of chocolate!

name: Cursor motivator
info: Motivated cursors work twice as hard!

name: Huge finger
info: Huge fingers give triple amount of chocolate!

name: Send flowers to grandma
info: Happy grandmas make double amount of chocolate!

name: Swift fingers
info: So much skill! Much wow! Triple amount of chocolate per tap!

info: Modernize cursors to double their production!

info: Your screen is screaming when tapping returns with tripple efiency!

name: How about a tap?
info:
Still no carpal tunnel 
syndrome? Taps x3!

name: Happy grandmas day
info: There is no such thing? Of course there is! Grandma production doubles!

name: Destructive mining
info: Kill all those ecoterrorists who want to stop your mining machines. Mine production x2!
